body: I think it's better to just write once (i.e. store the computed value as a second variable and set it once at the end); implementing it this way makes it more complicated to put watches or even to printf debug.
body_html: I think it's better to just write once (i.e. store the computed value as a second variable and set it once at the end); implementing it this way makes it more complicated to put watches or even to printf debug.
